summary:
11. Requests the Secretary-General to ensure UNOCI's compliance with the zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuses.

12. Recalls the importance of Ouagadougou Agreement provisions and urges Ivorian forces to rely on mediation.

13. Encourages the Facilitator to support the crisis settlement process and requests UNOCI to assist.

14. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
